{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Pokéball |image = [[File:Pokéball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Pokéball''. |price = 100 {{pdollar}} |catchTime = 1.25s |catchRate = 0% |location =
*[[Pokéball#Shops|Shops]] *[[Pokéball#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Pokéball''' is a type of [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Pokéball active and there is a remaining supply in the Pokéball selector. ==Details== A basic Pokéball to capture Pokémon with, it has no catch rate multiplier and catches a Pokémon in 1.25 seconds. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations &
